abilityPassives.name: Adaptability
abilityPassives.effect: Moves that are the same type as you deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Aerilate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Flying-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Aerilate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Flying-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Aftermath
abilityPassives.effect: When knocked out by a melee attack, the attacker loses 1d20 HP.

abilityPassives.name: Agile Entry
abilityPassives.effect: The first time you are attacked per day, your Defense and Special Defense are +1.

abilityPassives.name: Alacrity
abilityPassives.effect: Your Speed cannot be lowered by a foe's effects.

abilityPassives.name: All Out
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Fighting-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Analytic
abilityPassives.effect: When attacking a foe who has already acted this round, deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Anger Point
abilityPassives.effect: When hit by a critical hit, raise Attack +6 for 10 mins. This passive does not stack.

abilityPassives.name: Anger Shell
abilityPassives.effect: While you are below 20 HP, your attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Armor Tail
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to priority attacks that are used out of turn order during combat.

abilityPassives.name: Aroma Veil
abilityPassives.effect: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to the effects of the moves Heal Block, Taunt, Encore, and Disable and the passive Cursed Body.

abilityPassives.name: Avenger
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever an ally is knocked out, your next damaging attack deals +4 damage. This effect can stack.

abilityPassives.name: Backfire
abilityPassives.effect: When knocked out by a melee attack, the attacker's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed are -1 for 5 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Backlash
abilityPassives.effect: When knocked out by a melee attack, the attacker's Defense, Special Defense, and Speed are -1 for 5 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Battery
abilityPassives.effect: Allies within 15 ft of you have +1 Special Attack.

abilityPassives.name: Battle Armor
abilityPassives.effect: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you.

abilityPassives.name: Battle Bond
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Greninja's Water Shuriken's base damage changes from 1d4 to 1d10.

abilityPassives.name: Beauty Star
abilityPassives.effect: Your Beauty-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Benefactor
abilityPassives.effect: If any ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain any temporary stat bonuses they had until those bonuses would expire.

abilityPassives.name: Berserk
abilityPassives.effect: While below half HP, you have +2 Special Attack.

abilityPassives.name: Big Pecks
abilityPassives.effect: Your Defense cannot be lowered by a foe's effects.

abilityPassives.name: Binding Grasp
abilityPassives.effect: When rolling an effect that can bind a target on hit, roll twice and use the better result.

abilityPassives.name: Bland
abilityPassives.effect: Your Normal-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Blaze
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Fire type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Blaze
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Fire-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Brute
abilityPassives.effect: If your Attack modifier exceeds the target's Defense, deal +4 damage on hit.

abilityPassives.name: Buggy Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Bug-type attacks used within 10ft of you by your-self or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Bulk Buster
abilityPassives.effect: You deal +4 damage against targets at full HP

abilityPassives.name: Carry On
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever an ally is knocked out, recover 1d6 HP.

abilityPassives.name: Centered Focus
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Gallade is immune to being Stunned. Mega Gallade has +2 more Defense.

abilityPassives.name: Champion Boose
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you knock out a foe, your highest stat is raised +2 for 10 mins. If you have two or more stats tied for your highest, pick one of them to raise by two this combat (This effect may stack)

abilityPassives.name: Cheek Pouch
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you consume a berry, you recover 10 HP in addition to any other effects.

abilityPassives.name: Chlorophyll
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sunny Weather, your Speed is +2.

abilityPassives.effect: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe's effects.

abilityPassives.effect: Add +1 during accuracy check whenever you use a melee attack.

abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Defog and use Defog.,

abilityPassives.name: Cold
abilityPassives.effect: Your Ice-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Color Change
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are attacked, your type is changed to the same type as the attack after taking damage and effects.

abilityPassives.name: Comatose
abilityPassives.effect: You are always Asleep but can still act as if you aren't. You are also immune to other afflictions.

abilityPassives.name: Combative
abilityPassives.effect: Your Fighting-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Commander
abilityPassives.effect: When adjacent to an allied Dondozo, Tatsugiri can go into Dondozo's mouth as a free action. While inside the allied Dondozo's mouth, Tatsugiri cannot act and its Skills and Passives cannot be used, but the allied Dondozo has +2 to its Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed. Additionally, Tatsugiri cannot be targeted or hit by any attacks, is unaffected by the effects of any moves, and allows the allied Dondozo to use any of Tatsugiri's moves.

abilityPassives.name: Competitive
abilityPassives.effect: If a foe lowers any of your stats, you have +2 Special Attack until your lowered stats are returned to normal.

abilityPassives.name: Compound Eyes
abilityPassives.effect: Add +1 during accuracy check whenever you use a ranged attack.

abilityPassives.name: Cool Star
abilityPassives.effect: Your Cool-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Corrosion
abilityPassives.effect: You can Poison and Toxify Steel-types and Poison-types.

abilityPassives.name: Corrupted
abilityPassives.effect: Your Dark-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Costar
abilityPassives.effect: At the start of combat, copy a stat passive from your nearest ally until the end of combat.

abilityPassives.name: Critastrophe
abilityPassives.effect: Your critical hits deal double the result of your rolled damage instead of dealing the maximum result possible.

abilityPassives.name: Cud Chew
abilityPassives.effect: When you consume a berry, its effect will activate a second time 1 round of combat later.

abilityPassives.name: Curious Medicine

abilityPassives.name: Cursed Body
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by a foe's melee attack, disable that attack for 10 mins. Cursed Body can only affect one attack at a time.

abilityPassives.name: Cute Charm
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Infatuate the attacker.

abilityPassives.name: Cute Star
abilityPassives.effect: Your Cute-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Damp
abilityPassives.effect: Explosion, Misty Explosion, and Self-Destruct fail to do anything if used within 40ft of you.

abilityPassives.name: Dark Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Dark-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Darken
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Dark-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Dauntless

abilityPassives.effect: You may not be targeted by Priority moves that are being used out of turn order.

abilityPassives.name: Deep Freeze
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Ice-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Defeatist
abilityPassives.effect: When your HP is below half of your max hit points, your stats are all -2.

abilityPassives.name: Defiant
abilityPassives.effect: If a foe lowers any of your stats, you have +2 Attack until your lowered stats are returned to normal.

abilityPassives.name: Devious Entrance
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Toxic Spikes and use Toxic Spikes.

abilityPassives.name: Dimming Light
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Dark-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Disguise
abilityPassives.effect: The first time you are hit with an attack each encounter, the attack is negated.

abilityPassives.name: Download

abilityPassives.name: Draconian Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Dragon-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Dragon-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Dry Skin
abilityPassives.effect: In sunny weather, you lose 4 HP at the end of your actions. In rainy weather, you recover 4 HP at the end of your actions. You are immune to Water-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Dynamic Entry
abilityPassives.effect: You have +3 to your first accuracy check each combat.

abilityPassives.name: Early Bird

abilityPassives.name: Earth Eater
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by a Ground-type attack, halve the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

abilityPassives.name: Effect Spore
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, randomly either Paralyze, Poison, or put to Sleep the attacker.

abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Electric Terrain and use Electric Terrain.

abilityPassives.name: Emergency Exit

abilityPassives.name: Esper
abilityPassives.effect: Your Psychic-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.effect: When hit by a critical hit, raise Speed +6 for 10 mins. This passive does not stack.

abilityPassives.name: Exposed
abilityPassives.effect: When you use a move or attack, you have -8 Defense and -8 Special Defense until your next turn. You also deal -8 damage with all attacks before applying weakness and resistance), Sturdy (If you would be brought from Max HP to 0 or below, you are instead brought to 1 HP.

abilityPassives.effect: Fairy-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Flying-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.effect: Allies within 25ft of you take -1d4 damage when attacked.

abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Rock-type attacks.

abilityPassives.effect: If a foe's effect would cause you to flee or be moved, instead your Attack is raised +1 for 10 mins

abilityPassives.effect: When using a Berry, you only use half of it while still gaining its full effects. You can only use half of a Berry if you have Harvest.

abilityPassives.effect: When calculating damage, apply your relevant modi-fier twice.

abilityPassives.effect: After acting, you may roll 1d20. On 16 or higher, any adjacent allies are cured of all afflictions.

abilityPassives.effect: Your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Spikes and use Spikes.

abilityPassives.effect: When a foe hits you with a Dark-type attack, your Attack is +1 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.effect: When knocked out by an attack, all adjacent allies recover 1d12 HP.

abilityPassives.name: Leaf Guard

abilityPassives.name: Lightning Rod
abilityPassives.effect: Any foe's ranged Electric-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe's Electric-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate an Electric-type attack

abilityPassives.name: Limber

abilityPassives.effect: Your Electric-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.effect: Your melee ranged attacks all have a range of 25ft, and are still melee attacks.

abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Psychic-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.effect: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being Poisoned or Toxified.

abilityPassives.name: Perish Body
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, the offender receives 3 Perish Coats. The Coat has the following ability: After acting, destroy one of your Perish Coats. If this is the third Perish coat you've destroyed during this encounter, set your HP to 0.

abilityPassives.name: Pickpocket
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, you steal the offender's held item, if any.

abilityPassives.name: Pixilate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fairy-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Pixilate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Fairy-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Plantify
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Grass-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Plus
abilityPassives.effect: If at least one ally has Plus or Minus within 10ft you, you have +3 Special Attack.

abilityPassives.name: Poison Heal
abilityPassives.effect: While afflicted with Poison or Toxification, you are healed instead of damaged by those afflictions. You are cured of Poison or Toxin once you are at Max HP.

abilityPassives.name: Poison Point
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Poison the attacker.

abilityPassives.name: Poison Touch
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you hit with a melee attack, you may roll 1d6. On 6, Poison the target.

abilityPassives.name: Poisonous Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Poison-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Poisonous
abilityPassives.effect: Your Poison-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Power of Alchemy
abilityPassives.effect: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally's passives for 2 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Power Spot
abilityPassives.effect: Attacks made within 10ft of you deal +4 damage, regardless if the attacker is friend or foe.

abilityPassives.name: Prankster
abilityPassives.effect: Your attacks that do not deal damage on hit have Priority.

abilityPassives.name: Pressure
abilityPassives.effect: If you are hit by a 3/day attack, the attacker can't use that attack for the remainder of the day.

abilityPassives.name: Propeller Tail
abilityPassives.effect: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other ability, instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at.

abilityPassives.name: Protean
abilityPassives.effect: You may change your type to the same type as an attack you are making while making it for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Psionate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Psychic-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Psychic Surge
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Psychic Terrain and use Psychic Terrain.

abilityPassives.name: Psychy Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Psychic-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Punk Rock
abilityPassives.effect: Your sound-based attacks deal +4 damage. You take 4 less damage from sound-based attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Purest Power
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Medicham has +4 More Attack

abilityPassives.name: Purifying Salt
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to status afflictions. You are resistant to Ghost-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Quakate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ground-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Queenly Majesty
abilityPassives.effect: You may not be targeted by Priority moves that are being used out of turn order.

abilityPassives.name: Quick Draw
abilityPassives.effect: 1/day, you may give one of your moves priority.

abilityPassives.name: Quick Feet
abilityPassives.effect: While afflicted, your Speed is +2.

abilityPassives.name: Rain Dish
abilityPassives.effect: If in Raining Weather, you regain 4 HP after you act.

abilityPassives.name: Rattled
abilityPassives.effect: When a foe hits you with a Bug-type, Ghost-type, or Dark-type attack, your Speed is +1 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Receiver
abilityPassives.effect: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, you gain one of your ally's passives for 2 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Reckless
abilityPassives.effect: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit, deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Recycle
abilityPassives.effect: When using a Berry, you only use half of it while still gaining its full effects. You can only use half of a Berry if you have Recycle.

abilityPassives.name: Reformation
abilityPassives.effect: The first time you take damage during combat, recover 1d12 HP.

abilityPassives.name: Refrigerate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ice-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Refrigerate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ice-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Regenerator
abilityPassives.effect: When returned to a Poke Ball, you recover to Max HP after being stored for 1 hour.

abilityPassives.name: Resilience
abilityPassives.effect: You cannot receive any afflictions if you've already been cured of an affliction during the same combat.

abilityPassives.name: Resistance Up
abilityPassives.effect: While below half HP, you have +2 Special De-fense.

abilityPassives.name: Restoration
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you recover HP, recover an additional 1d6 HP.

abilityPassives.name: Ridicure
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever a foe fails to hit an attack where you were a possible target, recover 1d4 HP.

abilityPassives.name: Ripen
abilityPassives.effect: When you use a Berry, double any effects it has.

abilityPassives.name: Rock Head
abilityPassives.effect: Your attacks that damage yourself on hit do not damage yourself.

abilityPassives.name: Rocky Payload
abilityPassives.effect: Your Rock-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Rocky Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Rock-type attacks used within 10ft of you by your-self or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Rough Skin
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, the attacker takes 4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Force
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, your Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +4 damage and you don't take damage from Sandstorming weather.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Power
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, Mega Garchomp's Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +8 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Rush
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, Your Speed is +2 and you don't take damage from Sandstorming weather.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Shelter
abilityPassives.effect: You take no damage from Sandstorming weather.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Spit
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, use Sandstorm as a free action.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Stream
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Sandstorm and use Sandstorm.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Veil
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, any foe's attacks made against you have -1 during accuracy check and you don't take damage from Sandstorming weather.

abilityPassives.name: Sand Vortex
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action Mega Tyranitar may use Sandstorm, even if it's not on their move list.

abilityPassives.name: Sap Sipper
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to Grass-type attacks. If you would be hit by a Grass-type attack, your Attack is +2 for 10 mins. This effect does not stack.

abilityPassives.name: Scheming
abilityPassives.effect: Your attacks against foes have -2 Accuracy. After the first time you miss an attack during an encounter, the -2 Accuracy penalty is removed and you gain +4 Special Attack until the end of the encounter.

abilityPassives.name: Schooling
abilityPassives.effect: When Wishiwashi is at half its HP or higher, it is in its School form. In its School form, Wishiwashi summons hundreds of fish-shaped balls of water and surrounds itself making it appear larger and making it stronger. When below 15 HP, Wishiwashi is in its Single form, dropping its façade and appearing much smaller on its own.

abilityPassives.name: Scrappy
abilityPassives.effect: Your Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can hit Ghost-type targets.

abilityPassives.name: Screen Cleaner
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you move through a Wall, Hazard, or adjacent to someone with a Coat, destroy all Walls, Hazards and Coats.

abilityPassives.name: Scuttlize
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Bug-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Seed Sower
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by an attack that dealt damage, as a free action you may deplete one use of Grassy Terrain and use Grassy Terrain immediately.

abilityPassives.name: Seed Trap
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by an attack that dealt damage, as a free action you may deplete one use of Leech Seed and use Leech Seed immediately.

abilityPassives.name: Sentry
abilityPassives.effect: If a foe's effect would cause you to flee or be moved, instead your Special Attack is raised +1 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Shadow Pull
abilityPassives.effect: Foes within 10ft of Mega Gengar cannot move away from you

abilityPassives.name: Sharpness
abilityPassives.effect: Your slashing attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Shattering
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Rock-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Shed Skin
abilityPassives.effect: After acting, you may roll 1d4. On 4, you are cured of any afflictions.

abilityPassives.name: Sheer Force
abilityPassives.effect: Your attacks that have additional effects that affect the target may deal +4 damage, but will not have those additional effects.

abilityPassives.name: Sheerest Force
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Camerupt's attacks that have additional effects that affect the target may deal +1d20 damage, but will not have those additional effects.

abilityPassives.name: Shell Armor
abilityPassives.effect: Critical hits are treated as normal hits against you

abilityPassives.name: Shield Dust
abilityPassives.effect: You are unaffected by additional effects from attacks that deal damage.

abilityPassives.name: Shields Down
abilityPassives.effect: When your HP is below half of your max hit points, your form changes to Core Form and your stats change. While Minior is not in its Core Revealed from, it is immune to afflictions

abilityPassives.name: Shields Up
abilityPassives.effect: While below half HP, you have +2 Defense.

abilityPassives.name: Side Effects
abilityPassives.effect: When attacking a foe who recovered HP since your last turn, you deal +1d12 damage on hit.

abilityPassives.name: Signature Spotlight
abilityPassives.effect: Your signature moves deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Sinkhole
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Ground-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Skill Link
abilityPassives.effect: Your scatter moves have +2 during Accuracy Check.

abilityPassives.name: Sky Fall
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Gravity and use Gravity.

abilityPassives.name: Slush Rush
abilityPassives.effect: While in Hailing weather, your Speed is +2 and you don't take damage from Hailing weather.

abilityPassives.name: Sniper
abilityPassives.effect: When you land a critical hit, you deal an additional 8 damage, applied before weakness and resistances.

abilityPassives.name: Snow Caller
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Snowscape and use Snowscape.

abilityPassives.name: Snow Cloak
abilityPassives.effect: While in Hailing weather, any foe's attacks made against you have -1 during Accuracy Check and you don't take damage from Hailing weather

abilityPassives.name: Snow Front
abilityPassives.effect: While in Hailing Weather, Mega Abomasnow's Ice-type attacks deal +1d8 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Snow Shelter
abilityPassives.effect: You take no damage from Hailing weather.

abilityPassives.name: Snow Warning
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Hail and use Hail.

abilityPassives.name: Solar Energy
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sunny weather, Mega Houndoom deals an additional 8 damage while attacking.

abilityPassives.name: Solar Power
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sunny weather, you deal an additional 4 damage while attacking. After acting in Sunny weather, you take 4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Solid Rock
abilityPassives.effect: Super-effective attacks against you deal -4 damage after applying weakness.

abilityPassives.name: Soul-Heart
abilityPassives.effect: When an ally is knocked out within 10ft of you, your Special Attack is +1 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Soundproof
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to sound-based attacks, like Boomburst, Bug Buzz, Chatter, Clanging Scales, Disarming Voice, Echoed Voice, Eerie Spell, Grass  Whistle, Hyper Voice, Overdrive, Perish Song, Roar, Round, Sing,  Snore, Sparkling Aria, Supersonic, Uproar

abilityPassives.name: Sparking
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Electric-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Speed Purity
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Blaziken has +4 more Speed

abilityPassives.name: Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Your Ghost-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Spookify
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Ghost-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Spritespell
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Fairy-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Stakeout
abilityPassives.effect: When you attack a target who has just joined the encounter since your last turn, you deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Stalwart
abilityPassives.effect: Your attacks cannot be redirected by passives or any other ability, instead only hitting a target your attack was directed at.

abilityPassives.name: Stance Change
abilityPassives.effect: Aegislash has two forms it constantly changes between. When you attack a foe, before making your accuracy check change into your Sword Form. When using a reaction move such as King's Shield or Protect, or a protective move like Safeguard or Light Screen, immediately change to Shield Form.

abilityPassives.name: Standfast
abilityPassives.effect: While Stunned, you have +3 Defense and +3 Special Defense.

abilityPassives.name: Static
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Paralyze the attacker.

abilityPassives.name: Steadfast
abilityPassives.effect: When you are Stunned, your Speed is +1 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Steam Engine
abilityPassives.effect: When a foe hits you with a Fire-type or Water-type attack, your Speed is +2 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Steel Force
abilityPassives.effect: While in Sandstorming Weather, Mega Steelix's Rock-type and Ground-type attacks deal +8 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Steelworker
abilityPassives.effect: Your Steel-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Steelworker
abilityPassives.effect: Your Steel-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Steely Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Steel-type attacks used within 10ft of you by your-self or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Steely Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Steel-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Stench
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, roll 1d4. On 4, Stun the attacker

abilityPassives.name: Sticky Hold
abilityPassives.effect: You cannot drop held items or have held items stolen from you.

abilityPassives.name: Storm Drain
abilityPassives.effect: Any foe's ranged Water-type attacks within 25ft or any adjacent foe's Water-type attacks are negated and drawn to you. Your Special Attack is +2 until the end of your next turn whenever you negate an Water-type attack.

abilityPassives.name: Strong Jaw
abilityPassives.effect: Your biting attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Sturdy
abilityPassives.effect: If you would be brought from Max HP to 0 or below, you are instead brought to 1 HP.

abilityPassives.name: Suction Cups
abilityPassives.effect: You cannot be moved by a foe's attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Supreme Overlord
abilityPassives.effect: When you join combat, your Attack and Special Attack are each raised +1 for each ally who has already been knocked out in the current encounter, for 10 mins. Supreme Overlord can only raise your Attack and Special Attack each up to +4.

abilityPassives.name: Surge Surfer
abilityPassives.effect: While in Electrified terrain, your Speed is +2.

abilityPassives.name: Swarm
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Swarm
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Bug-type attacks deal +4 damage

abilityPassives.name: Sweet Veil
abilityPassives.effect: You and your allies within 10ft of you are immune to being put to Sleep.

abilityPassives.name: Swift Swim
abilityPassives.effect: While in Raining weather, your Speed is +2.

abilityPassives.name: Swifter Swim
abilityPassives.effect: While in Raining weather, Mega Swampert's Speed is +4.

abilityPassives.name: Symbiosis
abilityPassives.effect: You can pass held items to allies within 10ft as a free action.

abilityPassives.name: Synchronize
abilityPassives.effect: When you are Burned, Poisoned, Paralyzed, or Toxified by a foe, the offender is also given the same affliction.

abilityPassives.name: Tangled Feet (Spinda)
abilityPassives.effect: When Own Tempo prevent you from becoming confused, any foe's attacks made against you have -1 during accuracy check for the remainder of combat.

abilityPassives.name: Tangled Feet
abilityPassives.effect: While you are confused, foes need to roll +1 during Accuracy Checks against you.

abilityPassives.name: Technician
abilityPassives.effect: When rolling damage, replace any rolled 1s or 2s with 3s.

abilityPassives.name: Telepathy
abilityPassives.effect: Your allies within 25ft do not harm you when the ally is using attacks that have an area of effect.

abilityPassives.name: Tera Aura
abilityPassives.effect: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe's effects.

abilityPassives.name: Thermal Exchange
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to being Burned. When you are hit by a Fire - type attack, your Attack is +2 for 10 mins. This effect does not stack.

abilityPassives.name: Thick Fat
abilityPassives.effect: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks and Ice-type attacks.

abilityPassives.name: Thicker Fat
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Venusaur takes -6 damage from Fire-type and Ice-type attacks after applying weaknesses and resistance.

abilityPassives.name: Tinted Lens
abilityPassives.effect: Your resisted attacks deal +4 damage after applying weaknesses and resistance.

abilityPassives.name: Too Pure
abilityPassives.effect: All attacks made against you are treated as if they are super-effective. If the attack already is, the attacker rolls +1 dice while rolling for damage.

abilityPassives.name: Torrent
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Torrent
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage

abilityPassives.name: Tough Claws and Fangs
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Charizard X's, Mega Aeridactyl's, and Mega Metagross's slashing and biting attacks deal +8 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Tough Claws
abilityPassives.effect: Your slashing attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Tough Star
abilityPassives.effect: Your Tough-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Toxic Boost
abilityPassives.effect: If you would have been Poisoned or Toxified you are not and your Attack is +2 for 2 mins. This effect does not stack

abilityPassives.name: Toxic Debris
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by an attack that dealt damage, as a free action you may deplete one use of Toxic Spikes and use Toxic Spikes immediately.

abilityPassives.name: Toxicate
abilityPassives.effect: Normal-type moves performed by you are treated as Poison-type moves.

abilityPassives.name: Trace
abilityPassives.effect: If Mega Alakazam is affected by a foe's passive, Mega Alakazam gains that passive until you lose Trace.

abilityPassives.name: Triage
abilityPassives.effect: Any moves you know that can heal have Reaction.

abilityPassives.name: Trick Entrance
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Trick Room and use Trick Room.

abilityPassives.name: Truant
abilityPassives.effect: You can't act on a round after a round where you have acted. Truant cannot be removed or disabled by any means.

abilityPassives.name: Unbreakable
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Steel-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Unnerve
abilityPassives.effect: Foes within 25ft of you cannot consume food.

abilityPassives.name: Unyielding
abilityPassives.effect: If you at half of your max HP or less, you cannot take more than 20 damage at a time.

abilityPassives.name: Very Limber
abilityPassives.effect: Mega Lopunny are immune to being Paralyzed. Mega Lopunny has +2 more Speed

abilityPassives.name: Viral
abilityPassives.effect: When you successfully afflict a target, any adjacent foes are also afflicted with the same affliction.

abilityPassives.name: Vital Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to being put to Sleep.

abilityPassives.name: Volt Absorb
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by an electric-type attack, half the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

abilityPassives.name: Wandering Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Whenever you are hit with a melee attack, you gain all of the offender's Not-Stat passives and lose Wandering Spirit, then they gain Wandering Spirit and lose all of their Not-Stat Passives for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Water Absorb (Maractus)
abilityPassives.effect: When you negate a water-type attack, heal half the amount of damage your would have taken if you had not negated the attack.

abilityPassives.name: Water Absorb
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by a water-type attack, half the damage, then you heal that much HP instead of taking damage.

abilityPassives.name: Water Bubble
abilityPassives.effect: You take -4 damage from Fire-type attacks. You add +4 damage to Water-type attacks. You are immune to being Burned.

abilityPassives.name: Water Compaction
abilityPassives.effect: When a foe hits you with a Water-type attack, your Defense is +2 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: Water Veil
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to being Burned.

abilityPassives.name: Watery Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Water-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Watery
abilityPassives.effect: Your Water-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Weak Armor
abilityPassives.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, Your Defense is -3 and your Speed is +3 for 10 mins. This does not stack.

abilityPassives.name: Weather Mute
abilityPassives.effect: You ignore the effects of weather and terrain. This does not dismiss weather or terrain.

abilityPassives.name: Well-Baked Body
abilityPassives.effect: You are immune to Fire-type attacks. When you are hit by Fire-type attacks, instead your Defense is +2 for 10 mins.

abilityPassives.name: White Smoke
abilityPassives.effect: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe's effects.

abilityPassives.name: Wind Power
abilityPassives.effect: When hit by a wind based attack, you may usethe move Charge as a free action.(Wind based attacks: Air Cutter, Blizzard, Fairy Wind, Gust,Heat Wave, Hurricane, Icy Wind, Petal Blizzard, Twister, Whirlwind)

abilityPassives.name: Wind Rider
abilityPassives.effect: When hit by a wind based attack, your Attack is +1 for 10 mins. (Wind based attacks: Air Cutter, Blizzard, Fairy Wind, Gust, Heat Wave, Hurricane, Icy Wind, Petal Blizzard, Twister, Whirlwind)

abilityPassives.name: Winged
abilityPassives.effect: Your Flying-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Wonder Guard
abilityPassives.effect: Shedinja is immune to attacks that are not super-effective. Wonder Guard cannot be removed or disabled by any means.

abilityPassives.name: Wonder Skin
abilityPassives.effect: Your stats cannot be lowered by a foe's effects.

abilityPassives.name: Wonderful Entry
abilityPassives.effect: As a free action you may deplete one use of Wonder Room and use Wonder Room.

abilityPassives.name: Wyrmflare
abilityPassives.effect: When you are below 20 HP, your Dragon-type attacks deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Zappy Spirit
abilityPassives.effect: Electric-type attacks used within 10ft of you by yourself or allies deal +4 damage.

abilityPassives.name: Zen Mode
abilityPassives.effect: Darmanitan changes to its Zen Form when it is below half of its max HP.

abilityPassives.name: Zero to Hero
abilityPassives.effect: When Palafin is reduced to 30 or less HP or if an ally is knocked out within 30ft of Palafin, you change from your Zero form to your Hero form for 10 mins.
